data.actual_result: When opening discord you see extra lines near your text box for a quick seconds
data.expected_result: Chat should open normally without the extra lines to be seen
data.short_description: Double lines appear near chat box on poor connection when force closing and re-opening discord
data.steps_to_repro: - Be on poor connection - Force close discord  - wait a while - Open discord again in a text channel where people regularly or daily talk - Observe your chat box closely
